package.name: SafeRespring
package.shortDescription: A tweak to hopefully save you when your device gets frozen to be able to respring by pressing the volume buttons in a specific pattern.

descriptionlist.description: Only tested on iOS 13, but should work on iOS 12 at least. Please reach out to me on Twitter with confirmation of if it's working on other iOS versions.

How does it work?
The tweak listens to hardware volume button presses and if it senses a certain pattern it resprings the device.
The idea is that whenever the device gets frozen, this should hopefully respring the device and make it usable again.

I originally made this tweak for the Flex tool because that freezes my device very often so if you have that problem this is the tweak for you.
The pattern is currently: volume up, volume down, volume up and volume down.
